incident_updates.body: Our teams have deployed a fix and we are continuing confirmations of service restorations. We'll continue to monitor closely to confirm stability. We'll continue to share additional updates here in one hour or as more information is available.

Our teams have deployed a fix and we are currently confirming service restorations. We'll continue to monitor closely to confirm stability. We'll continue to share additional updates here in one hour or as more information is available.

Our teams are continuing to diligently work on applying mitigations. Affected users may experience some loss of functionality. We'll continue to share additional updates here in one hour or as more information is available.

Our teams are continuing to diligently work on applying mitigations. Affected users may experience some loss of functionality. We'll continue to share additional updates here in one hour or as more information is available.

We have identified the cause of the issue and our teams are diligently working on a mitigation. Affected users may experience some loss of functionality. We'll continue to share additional updates here in one hour or as more information is available.

We are investigating an incident that is intermittently affecting Jira Align cloud customers. Due to this issue, customers might observe loss of some feature functionality.
We shall keep you informed on the progress in 60 mins or sooner.
